Title: B.J. and the A.C.
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Damon Lindelof, Elizabeth Peterson
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: A holiday display goes missing, sending Kevin scurrying to find out who is responsible. Tom and Christine run into trouble at a hospital and on the road.
